thread.title: Lenovo Showcasing ThinkCentre Thin Clients at VMWorld Europe 2015
thread.title_full: Lenovo Showcasing ThinkCentre Thin Clients at VMWorld Europe 2015

author: admin
title: Lenovo Showcasing ThinkCentre Thin Clients at VMWorld Europe 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/9/2015 @ 5:22 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Devon IT 
KING OF PRUSSIA, Pa., Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Devon IT, a leading provider of thin client software solutions is proud to partner with and showcase Lenovo's ThinkCentre Thin Client, M73 and Tiny-in-One Thin Client Monitor at VMWorld Europe 2015 in Barcelona, Spain. Last month, Devon IT and Lenovo's teams attended the US show in California and are thrilled to continue to showcase their products on an international scale. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20151008/275483LOGO 
Fully certified for all leading virtualization environments available with both LeTOS or WES7 operating systems and Lenovo Terminal Management software (LTM), the Lenovo M73 is one of the quickest and most powerful thin clients available today. 
"In today's fast-paced digital world, it's very difficult to keep customers engaged because demand is high for innovative technology that empowers and protects your information. Our M73 and Tiny-in-One are the solutions to service any organization in an instant." 
- Adrian Hedges, Vice President of Worldwide Sales, Devon IT 
Features and Benefits of ThinkCentre M73 Thin Client Device Include: -- Fully certified for Citrix, VMware and Microsoft virtual environments -- Award-winning Tiny chassis design -- Impressive dual core Intel 2.4Ghz 1840T processor -- High performance graphics 
Features and Benefits of the Tiny-in-One Monitor System include: -- Complete integration with the Tiny range of thin clients -- Stunning visuals with front and back tilt angles -- Crystal clear 23-inch wide LED or LCD display with 1920x1080 resolution -- Integrated single power supply for monitor and Tiny thin client -- Simple setup: no tools required 
Demonstrations of the Lenovo ThinkCentre thin clients and Lenovo end-to-end solutions are available in Lenovo's booth P203 at the VMWorld Europe show. 
For more information about Lenovo thin client solutions or product details email:info@ devonit.com or call +1 (610) 757-4220 or toll-free at (888) 524-9382. For more information about LeTOS and LTM please visit www.devonit.com/software . Follow Devon IT on Twitter @DevonIT. 
About Devon IT 
Devon IT, Inc., ( www.devonit.com ) is a leading information technology company that offers thin client software, hardware, and virtual desktop solutions. Devon IT's products offer users in various industries and environments greater IT security, enhanced manageability, improved reliability, and lower costs. Devon IT is also the creator of the patented VDI Blaster(TM), software that transforms PCs with hard drives into virtual desktops. The company is headquartered in King of Prussia, Pennsylvania with offices in London, and Shanghai. Read Devon IT's technical blog, "Thin Tank," at http://www.devonit.com/blog . 
All company, brand, or product names are registered trademarks or trademarks of their respective holders. 
Media Contact: Christine Olley, Devon IT, 8002517488, colley@devonintlgroup.com
